item.description:
Let's meet in front of The Clam Box/The Ice Box on Wollaston Beach. We'll wait a little while for people to arrive, and then find a spot on the beach together.

Zaida is the coordinator for this month.

The School of Essential Ingredients
By Erica Bauermeister

Respected chef and restaurateur Lillian has spent much of her 30-something years in the kitchen, looking for meaning and satisfaction in evocative, delicious combinations of ingredients. Endeavoring to instill that love and know-how in others, Lillian holds a season of Monday evening cooking classes in her restaurant. The novel takes up the story of each of her students, navigating readers through the personal dramas, memories and musings stirred up as the characters handle, slice, chop, blend, smell and taste. Each student's affecting story—painful transitions, difficult choices—is rendered in vivid prose and woven together with confidence.

Next few book selections:
August - Zaida
September - Eliza

Have a book suggestion for an upcoming meetup?
Add it to the South Shore discussion on the Bulletin Board here.

Read the book if you're planning to come.  Be a participant, not a spectator.
item.name: Quincy: School of Essential Ingredients
